Text: I'll tell you my secret weapon Agentbay, I used the 10 gig version here on another link and used DVD Flick http://www.dvdflick.net/ to create that DVD version. Created the image by using ImageBurn http://www.imgburn.com/ so it is easy to just download and burn straight vto DVD. I hate watching movies on my computer. I created the subtitles. Have them uploaded here as a separate file.
